original_text: So the men left and they travelled through the land. They described the land and each town and they wrote it in a book. They wrote about each of the seven parts of the land. Then they went back to Joshua at Shiloh, where the Israelites had put up their tents.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 가서 그 땅으로 두루 다니며 성읍들을 따라서 일곱 부분으로 책에 그려서 실로 진영에 돌아와 여호수아에게 나아오니

sentences.original_text: and they travelled through the land
and they wrote it in a book
They wrote about each of the seven parts of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 땅의 일곱 부분 각각에 대해 썼습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they went back to Joshua at Shiloh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그들은 실로에 있는 여호수아에게 돌아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: where the Israelites had put up their tents
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손들이 그들의 장막을 쳐 있던 곳에
